alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 11:50PM CST until January 12 at 12:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN LONOKE...SOUTHEASTERN FAULKNER AND NORTHEASTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 1150 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Olmstead, or near Little Rock AFB, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville... Cabot... Little Rock AFB... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Old Austin... Parnell... Gibson... Sylvania... Olmstead... Macon... Cato... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
